keyword: how many calories in string cheese
title: How Many Calories in String Cheese?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in string cheese per stick, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in String Cheese?
assumptions: Standard 1 oz (28g) mozzarella string cheese stick, made from pasteurized milk, no added flavors or preservatives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, milk type, portion size, and processing; always check product labels for accurate info.

quick_answer.text: One standard string cheese stick contains about 80 kcal and 7 g protein.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts labels for quick comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one string cheese stick?
faqs.a: Approximately 80 kcal for a standard 28g stick.

faqs.q: Is string cheese high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, one stick provides about 7 g of protein.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in string cheese?
faqs.a: Around 6 g total fat, including 3.5 g saturated fat per stick.
Very lowâ€”only 1 g carbs and 0 g fiber per stick.

faqs.q: How does brand affect calories in string cheese?
faqs.a: Brands vary; low-fat options are 50-70 kcal, while full-fat can reach 90 kcal.
